snippet.title: Disembodied - Official Reveal Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Check out the reveal trailer for Disembodied, an upcoming mixed-reality game where you control your disembodied hands with your... hands. Disembodied uses only hand tracking. In Disembodied, your hand movements are copied 1:1 to the disembodied hands, which you must maneuver through small levels, featuring various mechanics and challenges. Disembodied will be available on Meta Quest.
